p: M.W. designed and coordinated the study, conducted the literature review, drafted and revised the manuscript; W.F. contributed to the study design and draft writing; W.H. conducted the statistical analysis, wrote the Methods section and revised the manuscript; A.K. added important aspects to be considered in the study and helped draft and revise the manuscript; S.M. shared his database on reptiles and contributed to the literature review; and I.R. added important ideas on the study design and in the draft manuscript. All authors gave final approval for publication.
